textBeforeTable: Specifications     Customise the look of the DEH-X3550UI with independent control over both display and key button illumination. With 210,000 x 210,000 colour combinations to choose from, why not select a colour that compliments your car interior. Equipped with 1A USB, we’ve upped the power handling capability on the DEH-X3550UI, so you can connect and play music from more USB devices, such as tablets and HDD. You can also charge your phone faster. You can play tunes from traditional CDs or CD-R/RW, including MP3, WMA and WAV files. If your music is stored on a portable device, like an iPod, Android smartphone or USB stick, the front panel's illuminated USB and Aux-in gives them a direct connection to your car speakers via the DEH-X3500UI's sound system. The DEH-X3550UI's in-built amplifiers produce pristine sound delivered at 4 x 50W of pure, proven MOSFET power. If that isn't enough, you can always use the 2 RCA pre-outs to hook up another stereo component, like an extra amp for the rear speakers or a subwoofer, for example. For more information please visit http://www.mixtrax-global.com. MIXTRAX also features Club-Style Illumination that enhances the mood with a dynamic dance club-like lighting effect. As MIXTRAX begins, lights start pulsing to the beat of the music, adding an extra level of entertainment. Choose among multiple patterns of lighting variations from sound pressure level or low-pass synchronization modes. MIXTRAX makes automatic remixing of tracks extra-quick and easy. Simply connect your USB compatible device and listen
